articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens
Beyond native digital payments, the most powerful thing that blockchains / web3 / decentralized software infrastructure enables is immutable, shared, public data and APIs.
You no longer have to worry about the API your app or business depends on being fucked with or shut down.
